title: Top People in the NFL’s 2020 Season
description:
Cole Wright, Ryan Shazier, Kevin Clark, and Danny Kelly give their lists of the top people in football in 2020 (1:50). Cole and Ryan discuss ESPN analyst Booger McFarland’s most recent comments about Dwayne Haskins (1:06:20), and then share a clip of Bakari Sellers's latest interview with quarterback guru Quincy Avery. Avery has trained Haskins in the past, and he talks about what’s next for the young quarterback (1:11:20).
 To check out the full episode follow 'The Bakari Sellers Podcast.'
